channel.title: [Guide] Good monsters to train on
channel.description:
[center]This is a guide to see good training methods.[/center]
[size=13pt]Hitpoints 10-15[/size]
[u]Free play[/u]
[b]Chickens[/b] (level-1) Location: South of Falador; northeast of Draynor Village; north of Lumbridge. Average XP per hour: 4,320 XP to combat; 1,400 XP to HP.
[b]Goblins[/b] (level-2) Location: Lumbridge; Goblin village north of Falador. Average XP per hour: 7,200 XP to combat; 2,400 XP to HP.
[b]Cows[/b] (level-2) Location: Northeast of Draynor Village; Crafting Guild; Lumbridge. Average XP per hour: 9,600 XP to combat; 3,200 XP to HP.
[u]Members[/u]
[b]Gnome troops[/b] (level-1) Location: Khazard Battlefield, southeast of Ardougne. Average XP per hour: 5,800 XP to combat; 1,900 XP to HP. [u] [/u] [size=13pt]Hitpoints 16-30[/size]
[u]Free play[/u]
[b]Men/Women[/b] (level-2) Location: Edgeville; Blue Moon Inn at Varrock. Average XP per hour: 8,400 XP to combat; 2,700XP to HP.
[b]Al kharid warrior[/b] (level-9) Location: Al Kharid palace. Average XP per hour: 13,600 XP to combat; 4,500 XP to HP.
[u]Members[/u]
[b]Gnome troops [/b] (level-1) Location: Khazard Battlefield, southeast of Ardougne. Average XP per hour: 5,800 XP to combat; 1,900XP to HP. [u] [/u] [size=13pt]Hitpoints 31-40[/size]
[u]Free play[/u]
[b]Al kharid warrior[/b] (level-9) Location: Al Kharid palace. Average XP per hour: 13,600 XP to combat; 4,500 XP to HP.
[b]Skeleton[/b] (level-18/22/25) Location: Varrock sewers; Edgeville dungeon; Karamja volcano. Average XP per hour: 17,000 XP to combat; 5,700 XP to HP.
[u]Members[/u]
[b]Thug[/b] (level-10) Location: Edgeville members wilderness dungeon (level-1-3 wild). Wilderness northeast of Edgeville (level-8 wild). Average XP per hour: 12,900 XP to combat; 4,300 XP to HP. [u] [/u] [size=13pt]Hits Level 41-50[/size]
[u]Free play[/u]
[b]Jail guard[/b] (level-26) Location: Draynor jail. Average XP per hour: 14,000 XP to combat; 4,600 XP to HP.
[b]Deadly red spider[/b] (level-34) Location: Edgeville wilderness dungeon (members); Arandar (members); Karamja Volcano. Average XP per hour: 11,000 XP to combat; 3,500 XP to HP.
[b]Guard[/b] (level-21) Location: Varrock palace; Falador center; Edgeville's Guard hut. Average XP per hour: 10,000 XP to combat; 3,500 XP to HP.
[u]Members[/u]
[b]Khazard trooper[/b] (level-19) Location: Khazard battlefield, southeast of Ardougne. Average XP per hour: 10,000 XP to combat; 3,500 XP to HP. [u] [/u] [size=13pt]Hits Level 51-60[/size]
[u]Free play[/u]
[b]Black knight[/b] (level-33) Location: Black knight's fortress west of Edgeville; Taverley dungeon (members). Average XP per hour: 18,000 XP to combat; 5,800 XP to HP.
[b]White knight[/b] (level-36) Location: White knight's castle, Falador. Average XP per hour: 13,000 XP to combat; 4,400 XP to HP.
[b]Deadly red spider[/b] (level-34) Location: Edgeville wilderness dungeon (members); Arandar (members); Karamja Volcano. Average XP per hour: 11,000 XP to combat; 3,500 XP to HP.
[u]Members[/u]
[b]Jungle spider[/b] (level-44) Location: Yanille, northeast on an isle; Karamja jungle. Average XP per hour: 22,000 XP to combat; 8,000 XP to HP. [u] [/u] [size=13pt]Hitpoints 61-70[/size]
[u]Free play[/u]
[b]Lesser demon[/b] (level-82) Location: Karamja Volcano. Average XP per hour: 28,000 XP to combat; 9,000 XP to HP.
[b]Skeleton[/b] (level-45) Location: Karamja Volcano. Average XP per hour: 25,000 XP to combat; 8,600 XP to HP.
[b]Ice warrior[/b] (level-57) Location: Ice caves, south of Port Sarim; Ice plateau, northwest corner of the wilderness. Average XP per hour: 29,000 XP to combat; 9,300 XP to HP.
[b]Moss giant[/b] (level-42) Location: Crandor island; Varrock sewers (right at the end), Wilderness (level 28 or so). Average XP per hour: 25,000 XP to combat; 8,600 XP to HP.
[u]Members[/u]
[b]Jungle spider[/b] (level-44) Location: Yanille, northeast on an isle; Karamja jungle. Average XP per hour: 22,000 XP to combat; 8,000 XP to HP. [u] [/u] [size=13pt]Hitpoints 71-85[/size]
[u]Free play[/u]
[b]Lesser demon[/b] (level-82) Location: Karamja Volcano. Average XP per hour: 28,000 XP to combat; 9,000 XP to HP.
[b]Ice warrior[/b] (level-57) Location: Ice caves, south of Port Sarim; Ice plateau, northwest corner of the wilderness. Average XP per hour: 32,000 XP to combat; 9,900 XP to HP.
[u]Members[/u]
[b]Magic axe[/b] (level-42) Location: Wilderness axe hut (level 55 wild). Average XP per hour: 22,000 XP to combat; 8,000 XP to HP.
[b]Dagannoth[/b] (level-74/92) Location: Lighthouse basement. Average XP per hour: 40,000 XP to combat; 13,000 XP to HP. [u] [/u] [size=13pt]Hitpoints 86-99[/size]
[u]Free play[/u]
[b]Ice warrior[/b] (level-57) Location: Ice caves, south of Port Sarim; Ice plateau, northwest corner of the wilderness. Average XP per hour: 32,000 XP to combat; 9,900 XP to HP.
[u]Members[/u]
[b]Fire giant[/b] (level-86) Location: Brimhaven dungeon, Baxtorian Falls, a wilderness dungeon, . Average XP per hour: 48,000 XP to combat; 16,000 XP to HP.
[b]Greater demon[/b] (level-92) Location: Brimhaven dungeon, Gu'tanoth. Average XP per hour: 28,000 XP to combat; 9,000 XP to HP.
[b]Bandit[/b] (level-57) Location: Bandit camp, south of Al Kharid in the desert; Pollnivneach. Average XP per hour: 26,000 XP to combat; 8,000 XP to HP.
[b]Pirate[/b] (level-26) Location: Wilderness pirate hut (level 55 wild). Average XP per hour: 43,000 XP to combat; 15,000 XP to HP.
[b]Dagannoth[/b] (level-74/92) Location: Lighthouse basement. Average XP per hour: 42,000 XP to combat; 15,000 XP to HP.

item.title: [Guide] Good monsters to train on
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Experiments and Rock Crabs are great experience regardless of hp level.

item.title: [Guide] Good monsters to train on
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

looks good but add something like 31hp-50 giants cause i see u missed reg giants. they give pretty good xp

Read full topic

item.title: [Guide] Good monsters to train on
item.dc:creator: @Riven89 Riven89
item.description:
@Riven89 wrote:

Believe it or not, a great place to level if you have a low level character, or a pure, is pirates near the hobgoblins and ice warriors south east of Port Sarim. I train my pure there.

Read full topic

item.title: [Guide] Good monsters to train on
item.dc:creator: @DaMaGeX DaMaGeX
item.description:
@DaMaGeX wrote:

Yea i see what i can do, I post some other skills guides soon

Read full topic

item.title: [Guide] Good monsters to train on
item.dc:creator: @ShadowSyntax ShadowSyntax
item.description:
@ShadowSyntax wrote:

I like it.

Some suggestions:
*For Hitpoints 31-40 the zombies in the wilderness and hill giants (in taverly dungeon if your a member) are great experience.

*For Hitpoints 10-15 rather than training on chickens which are always crowded, train on the seagulls at the Port Sarim docks.

Read full topic
